00110 #if (__ARMCC_VERSION < 400677)
00111 extern uint32_t __REV16(uint32_t value);
00112 #else  /* (__ARMCC_VERSION >= 400677)  */
00113 static __INLINE __ASM uint32_t __REV16(uint32_t value)
00114 {
00115   rev16 r0, r0
00116   bx lr
00117 }
00118 #endif /* __ARMCC_VERSION  */
00119

00129 extern int32_t __REVSH(int32_t value);
00130 #else  /* (__ARMCC_VERSION >= 400677)  */
00131 static __INLINE __ASM int32_t __REVSH(int32_t value)
00132 {
00133   revsh r0, r0
00134   bx lr
00135 }
00136 #endif /* __ARMCC_VERSION  */

00539 __attribute__( ( always_inline ) ) static __INLINE uint32_t __REV(uint32_t value)
00540 {
00541   uint32_t result;
00542 
00543   __ASM volatile ("rev %0, %1" : "=r" (result) : "r" (value) );
00544   return(result);
00545 }
00546

00719 #define __SSAT(ARG1,ARG2) \
00720 ({                          \
00721   uint32_t __RES, __ARG1 = (ARG1); \
00722   __ASM ("ssat %0, %1, %2" : "=r" (__RES) :  "I" (ARG2), "r" (__ARG1) ); \
00723   __RES; \
00724  })
00725 
00726 
00735 #define __USAT(ARG1,ARG2) \
00736 ({                          \
00737   uint32_t __RES, __ARG1 = (ARG1); \
00738   __ASM ("usat %0, %1, %2" : "=r" (__RES) :  "I" (ARG2), "r" (__ARG1) ); \
00739   __RES; \
00740  })
00741

00750 __attribute__( ( always_inline ) ) static __INLINE uint8_t __CLZ(uint32_t value)
00751 {
00752   uint8_t result;
00753 
00754   __ASM volatile ("clz %0, %1" : "=r" (result) : "r" (value) );
00755   return(result);
